title: Help me improve
my business's online presence
prompt_suggestions.content: What are some effective strategies to improve my business's online presence and attract more customers?

title: Give me ideas
for marketing my products
prompt_suggestions.content: Can you suggest some innovative marketing ideas to promote my products and increase sales?

title: Share a tip
for effective time management
prompt_suggestions.content: What are some time management techniques that can help me be more productive in my business?

title: Explain
how to create a business plan
prompt_suggestions.content: Can you guide me through the steps of creating a comprehensive business plan?

title: Advise me
on financial planning for my business
prompt_suggestions.content: What are some key considerations for effective financial planning and management for a small business?

title: Help me understand
the basics of digital marketing
prompt_suggestions.content: Can you explain the basics of digital marketing and how I can leverage it for my business?

title: Suggest ways
to improve customer satisfaction
prompt_suggestions.content: What are some strategies to enhance customer satisfaction and build long-term loyalty?
